title: Is the Kha'Zix passive ever going to be fixed?
body:
{{champion:121}} Bugged  since 5.23, when Kha'Zix had 5% size reduction.

Unfortunately, It seems no one cared about the Unseen threat aura size being completely out of place right now on every skin. The way it looks on Mecha is just ridiculous.

replies.body: Yup! This is a known issue and is on the radar to be resolved.
